info.name: Board Library for Lichess
info.description: A compilation of Chess boards from me and other creators. 16+ boards included.
info.additionalInfo: No Editing required, just use the Lichess theme changer to pick. Pixelated boards in the preview are broken, I will try to fix them. I actually don't know why Lichess can't render them properly in the preview, but it's likely because they are very small. They worked well until recently. There's also only like 3 that look weird in the preview so. Yeah. Enjoy.
